statements: SELECT * FROM music_merchandise_inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM music_merchandise_inventory WHERE item_price <= 50;
SELECT * FROM music_merchandise_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY item_category ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity_in_stock FROM music_merchandise_inventory WHERE item_category = 'Apparel';
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM music_merchandise_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%Guitar%';
SELECT * FROM music_merchandise_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY item_price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM music_merchandise_inventory WHERE item_category = 'CDs' ORDER BY item_price ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM music_merchandise_inventory ORDER BY item_id, item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity_in_stock FROM music_merchandise_inventory WHERE item_price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_merchandise_inventory WHERE item_category IN ('Vinyl', 'CDs') AND quantity_in_stock > 5 ORDER BY item_category, item_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM MusicMerchandiseInventory WHERE id = 1
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM MusicMerchandiseInventory ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM StockLevels WHERE stock_quantity > 50
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM MusicMerchandiseInventory WHERE price < 50
SELECT id, last_updated FROM StockLevels ORDER BY last_updated ASC
SELECT * FROM MusicMerchandiseInventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM MusicMerchandiseInventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT MMI.product_name, SL.stock_quantity FROM MusicMerchandiseInventory AS MMI INNER JOIN StockLevels AS SL ON MMI.id = SL.product_id WHERE MMI.quantity > 10 ORDER BY SL.stock_quantity DESC
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM MusicMerchandiseInventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00

SELECT MMI.product_name, SL.stock_quantity FROM MusicMerchandiseInventory AS MMI LEFT JOIN StockLevels AS SL ON MMI.id = SL.product_id WHERE SL.last_updated >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY MMI.product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Merchandise;
SELECT id, name, category, price FROM Merchandise WHERE price > 50;
SELECT description, price FROM Merchandise WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, stock_level FROM Merchandise WHERE stock_level < 10 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Merchandise WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT name, price FROM Merchandise WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, description, category FROM Merchandise WHERE stock_level > 0 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY category, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders o JOIN Customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 500 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MusicAlbums;
SELECT album_name, artist, release_date FROM MusicAlbums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT album_name, artist, price FROM MusicAlbums WHERE price > 20.00;
SELECT * FROM MerchandiseItems WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerDetails;
SELECT * FROM MusicAlbums ORDER BY release_date DESC, price ASC;
SELECT album_name, artist, price FROM MusicAlbums WHERE artist = 'Taylor Swift';
SELECT album_name, artist, price, release_date FROM MusicAlbums WHERE price > 20 AND release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM MerchandiseItems ORDER BY category ASC, price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM CustomerDetails WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT merchandise_name, stock_level, price FROM Merchandise WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT order_id, merchandise_id, order_date, quantity FROM Orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT merchandise_name, stock_level FROM Merchandise WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.quantity FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE Orders.quantity > 5;

SELECT Suppliers.supplier_name, COUNT(DISTINCT Transactions.order_id) AS total_transactions FROM Suppliers JOIN Orders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Orders.supplier_id JOIN Transactions ON Orders.order_id = Transactions.order_id GROUP BY Suppliers.supplier_name;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.quantity, Merchandise.merchandise_name FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Merchandise ON Orders.merchandise_id = Merchandise.merchandise_id WHERE Orders.quantity >= 10 ORDER BY Orders.quantity DESC, Customers.customer_name ASC;
